Class ProjectVersionChanger

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change.AbstractVersionChanger
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change.ProjectVersionChanger
All Implemented Interfaces:
VersionChanger
public class ProjectVersionChanger extends AbstractVersionChanger
A VersionChanger implementation that changes dependency versions.

This class extends the AbstractVersionChanger and provides functionality to update dependency versions in a Maven POM file. It utilizes the PomHelper to set the new versions and logs the changes made.

Author:
Stephen Connolly
